item.title: My First Use of Hugo
item.description: I make myself laugh. The title is so “meta”. My first use of hugo is in hugo. :-/ Anyways, for the most part, so far, so good for the most past. I’ve created a site, added some themes and created this first post. There are some hiccups along the way though. They are all documentation related at this point. Little Bumps In The Road First one, is a chicken and the egg sort of thing.
